mean_cn: n. 保持器，家臣，保持者，【机】护圈，预付费用
mean_en: a device that you put in your mouth to keep your teeth in the correct position especially after you have had braces
word_etyma: re一再+tain=tenet保持+er名词后缀 → 保持器
short_phrase: have a metal retainer in one's mouth
sentence: This retainer should help straighten your teeth.
sentence_trans: 这幅牙套应该可以帮助你矫正牙齿。
